name: Component Accessibility Check
description: Ensures React components follow accessibility best practices when saved
outputPrompt:
‚ôø ACCESSIBILITY CHECK - Component modified!

Please review the modified component for accessibility compliance:

1. **Semantic HTML** - Are proper semantic elements used (button, nav, main, etc.)?
2. **ARIA labels** - Do interactive elements have proper aria-label or aria-labelledby?
3. **Keyboard navigation** - Can all interactive elements be accessed via keyboard?
4. **Focus management** - Is focus properly managed in modals and dynamic content?
5. **Color contrast** - Do text and background colors meet WCAG AA standards?
6. **Alt text** - Do images have descriptive alt attributes?
7. **Form labels** - Are form inputs properly labeled?
8. **Screen reader support** - Will screen readers understand the component structure?
